name: Anterior shoulder (deltopectoral) approach
text: Anterior (deltopectoral) shoulder approach. Superficial interval: deltoid (axillary nerve) and pectoralis major (medial and lateral pectoral nerves). Deep interval: deltopectoral groove. Structures at risk: cephalic vein, musculocutaneous nerve, axillary nerve, anterior humeral circumflex artery.

name: Lateral shoulder (deltoid-splitting) approach
text: Lateral (deltoid-splitting) shoulder approach. Superficial interval: split deltoid (axillary nerve). Structures at risk: axillary nerve.

name: Posterior shoulder approach
text: Posterior shoulder approach. Superficial interval: split deltoid (axillary nerve). Deep interval: infraspinatus (suprascapular nerve) and teres minor (axillary nerve). Structures at risk: axillary nerve, posterior humeral circumflex artery, suprascapular nerve.

name: Distal anterolateral humerus approach
text: Distal anterolateral humerus approach. Superficial interval: brachialis (musculocutaneous nerve) and brachioradialis (radial nerve). Structures at risk: musculocutaneous nerve, radial nerve, lateral antebrachial cutaneous nerve.

name: Posterior humerus (triceps-splitting) approach
text: Posterior humerus triceps-splitting approach. Superficial interval: lateral and long heads of triceps (distal to radial nerve branching). Deep interval: split medial deep head of triceps (radial nerve). Structures at risk: radial nerve, ulnar nerve.

name: Lateral elbow (Kocher) approach
text: Kocher lateral elbow approach. Superficial interval: anconeus (radial nerve) and extensor carpi ulnaris (posterior interosseous nerve). Structures at risk: posterior interosseous nerve, lateral ulnar collateral ligament.

name: Anterior forearm (Henry) approach
text: Anterior forearm (Henry) approach. Superficial interval: brachioradialis (radial nerve) and pronator teres/flexor carpi radialis (median nerve). Structures at risk: posterior interosseous nerve, recurrent radial artery, radial artery, superficial branch of radial nerve.

name: Dorsal wrist approach
text: Dorsal wrist approach. Interval through third and fourth extensor compartments; no true internervous plane. Structures at risk: posterior interosseous nerve.

name: Volar wrist (distal Henry) approach
text: Volar wrist (distal Henry) approach. Structures encountered: median nerve and radial artery. Structures at risk: median nerve including recurrent motor branch and palmar cutaneous branch.

name: Carpal tunnel approach
text: Carpal tunnel approach. Superficial contents: median and ulnar nerves. Deep structure released: transverse carpal ligament. Structures at risk: median nerve including recurrent motor branch and palmar cutaneous branch.
